response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. I believe its true value far exceeds its price tag, making it a remarkable investment for someone like yourself who appreciates the finer things in life.

Considering the exceptional features and benefits this product offers, I am extending an exclusive invitation to purchase it for $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to share in the appreciation of this masterpiece.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this unique piece into your collection.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
